Description: Failed to ensure that each appliance and flue, namely gas central heating boilers and associated flues were checked for safety within twelve months of installation or within a period of 12 months before the said lease commenced and failed to ensure that all gas fittings and flues serving the gas central heating system, namely boilers, associated flues and ECVs (Emergency Cut-off Valves) in flats, were maintained in a safe condition so as to prevent the risk of injury to tenants in these flats,
